# braintrustdata_projects (Data Source)

Lists Braintrust projects using API-native filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List projects with no filters.
data "braintrustdata_projects" "all" {
  limit = 50
}

# Filter projects by API-native parameters.
data "braintrustdata_projects" "filtered" {
  project_name = "my-ml-project"
  org_name     = "example-org"
}

output "project_lists" {
  value = {
    all_ids   = data.braintrustdata_projects.all.ids
    filtered  = data.braintrustdata_projects.filtered.projects
    all_count = length(data.braintrustdata_projects.all.projects)
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ending_before` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch projects before this ID.
- `limit` (Number) Optional max number of projects to return.
- `org_name` (String) Optional organization name filter.
- `project_name` (String) Optional exact project name filter.
- `starting_after` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch projects after this ID.

### Read-Only

- `ids` (List of String) List of returned project IDs.
- `projects` (Attributes List) List of projects. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--projects))

<a id="nestedatt--projects"></a>
### Nested Schema for `projects`

Read-Only:

- `created` (String) The timestamp when the project was created.
- `description` (String) A description of the project.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the project.
- `name` (String) The name of the project.
- `org_id` (String) The organization ID the project belongs to.
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user who created the project.
